text:
James Alton Coates (August 4, 1932 – November 15, 2019) was an American professional baseball pitcher. Coates pitched in Major League Baseball for the New York Yankees (1956, 1959–62), Washington Senators (1963), Cincinnati Reds (1963), and California Angels (1965–67). He was born in Farnham, Virginia.
Coates died on November 15, 2019 in Lancaster, Virginia at the age of 87.
